actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: To amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to require States to continue aid to families with dependent children during the first month of employment of the recipient.

summary.text: Amends part A (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) (AFDC) of title IV of the Social Security Act to require States to continue AFDC benefits for a limited period after employment is commenced.

titles.title: To amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to require States to continue aid to families with dependent children during the first month of employment of the recipient.
